topMentions.text: Rain Maker's drone-based cloud seeding is showing real results in Utah. This could change the game for western water.
Weather modification technology deserves serious regulatory attention. Rain Maker leading the charge.
Excited to share our latest results from the Jordan pilot program. Water modification works.
Still no accountability for cloud seeding impacts on Texas rainfall patterns. @rainmakercorp needs to answer.
Rain Maker quietly building one of the most important climate tech companies. Thiel Fellows alumni doing real work.
